name: Anyone Can Cook!
description:
Greetings Chef!

Play as one of the four distinct characters in Disney's Ratatouille racing to serve Anton Ego your special dish! Make money, sabotage your opponents, and cook your heart out!

Play the game by downloading the PCIO file and importing it at playingcards.io! To import files into playingcards.io, please see this guide.

Happy cooking!
